name: DadDeck™ - Pack Opening Audio System
description: Micro-tasks for exceptional pack opening audio - sound effects, haptic feedback, and audio controls.

userStories.title: Add pack tear sound effect trigger
userStories.description: Play sound when pack tear animation starts.
acceptanceCriteria: Trigger tear sound on pack_tear_animate state
Test sound syncs with tear animation

userStories.title: Source or create pack tear sound file
userStories.description: Obtain sound effect for pack opening.
acceptanceCriteria: Or create synthesized tear sound using Web Audio API

userStories.title: Add card flip sound for common rarity
userStories.description: Play subtle flip sound when common card revealed.
acceptanceCriteria: Trigger flip sound on common card reveal
Sound should be subtle card flip/click

userStories.title: Add card flip sound for uncommon rarity
userStories.description: Play slightly enhanced flip sound for uncommon cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Trigger enhanced flip sound on uncommon reveal
Sound has slight pitch boost from common

userStories.title: Add card flip sound for rare rarity
userStories.description: Play distinctive flip sound for rare cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Trigger distinctive flip sound on rare reveal

userStories.title: Add card reveal sound for epic rarity
userStories.description: Play triumphant sound for epic card reveals.
acceptanceCriteria: Trigger triumphant sound on epic reveal

userStories.title: Add card reveal sound for legendary rarity
userStories.description: Play epic orchestral hit for legendary cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Trigger orchestral hit on legendary reveal

userStories.title: Add card reveal sound for mythic rarity
userStories.description: Play celebration sequence for mythic cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Trigger celebration sound on mythic reveal

userStories.title: Add holo shimmer sound effect
userStories.description: Play subtle shimmer for holographic cards.

userStories.title: Implement sound preload on page load
userStories.description: Preload all sound effects when app loads.
acceptanceCriteria: Preload all pack opening SFX on app init
Sounds cached in memory for instant playback
Test no delay when first sound plays

userStories.title: Add light haptic feedback on common reveal
userStories.description: Trigger light vibration for common card on Android.
acceptanceCriteria: Add vibrate(50) call on common reveal
Add try-catch for iOS (no haptic support)

userStories.title: Add medium haptic feedback on rare reveal
userStories.description: Trigger medium vibration for rare card on Android.
acceptanceCriteria: Add vibrate(100) call on rare reveal
Vibration feels more noticeable than common

userStories.title: Add strong haptic feedback on epic reveal
userStories.description: Trigger strong vibration for epic card on Android.
acceptanceCriteria: Add vibrate(150) call on epic reveal

userStories.title: Add heavy haptic feedback on legendary reveal
userStories.description: Trigger heavy vibration pattern for legendary card.

userStories.title: Add extreme haptic feedback on mythic reveal
userStories.description: Trigger maximum vibration pattern for mythic card.
acceptanceCriteria: Vibration feels as intense as device allows

userStories.title: Add haptic feedback on pack tear
userStories.description: Light vibration when pack tears open.

userStories.title: Create haptic intensity settings
userStories.description: Allow users to control haptic feedback strength.

userStories.title: Add master volume slider (0-100%)
userStories.description: Create master audio volume control.
acceptanceCriteria: Add range input for master volume (0-100)
All SFX volume scales by master setting

userStories.title: Add SFX volume slider (0-100%)
userStories.description: Create separate sound effects volume control.
acceptanceCriteria: Add range input for SFX volume (0-100)
SFX includes: pack tear, card flips, holo shimmer
SFX volume scales by master × SFX setting

userStories.title: Add music volume slider (0-100%)
userStories.description: Create music volume control for future background music.
acceptanceCriteria: Add range input for music volume (0-100)
Label: 'Music (Coming Soon)' if no music yet
Music volume scales by master × music setting

userStories.title: Add mute toggle button
userStories.description: Quick mute button to disable all audio.
acceptanceCriteria: Icon shows mute status (speaker X vs speaker)

userStories.title: Add sound settings to navigation
userStories.description: Quick access to sound controls from nav bar.
acceptanceCriteria: Settings modal shows all audio controls

userStories.title: Implement audio state persistence
userStories.description: Save audio settings to localStorage.
acceptanceCriteria: Settings include: masterVolume, sfxVolume, musicVolume, muted
Load settings from localStorage on init
Save settings to localStorage on change
Test settings persist across browser sessions

userStories.title: Add per-category volume controls
userStories.description: Fine-grained volume control for each sound category.
acceptanceCriteria: Add volume sliders for: pack tears, card flips, holo shimmer
Each scales by master × category setting

userStories.title: Compress audio files for web delivery
userStories.description: Optimize audio file sizes for fast loading.
acceptanceCriteria: Audit all audio files in public/sounds/
Compress to MP3 at 128kbps or OGG at 96kbps

userStories.title: Test audio works on iOS Safari
userStories.description: Verify audio playback on iOS devices.

userStories.title: Test audio works on Android Chrome
userStories.description: Verify audio playback on Android devices.
acceptanceCriteria: Test on Android device with Chrome

userStories.title: Add audio fade-out on pack complete
userStories.description: Fade out background sounds when pack opening finishes.
acceptanceCriteria: Fade out any playing sounds over 1s
Use Web Audio API gain node for fade

userStories.title: Implement sound queue system
userStories.description: Queue sounds to prevent overlapping audio.
acceptanceCriteria: Create sound queue for playing SFX
Only one sound per category plays at once
New sounds in same category replace previous
Different categories can overlap (SFX + holo shimmer)

userStories.title: Add accessibility option to disable haptics
userStories.description: Allow users to disable all haptic feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: When disabled, no vibrate() calls execute
Default: enabled on Android, disabled on iOS

userStories.title: Create audio fallback for no-sound devices
userStories.description: Graceful degradation when audio unavailable.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Web Audio API support detection
If audio not supported, skip all audio calls
Log audio failure to console (debug only)
App remains fully functional without audio
Test on desktop with no audio hardware

userStories.title: Add audio visualization setting
userStories.description: Optional audio visual feedback for hearing impaired.
acceptanceCriteria: When enabled, show wave/pulse on sounds
Visual appears on corner of screen

userStories.title: Implement audio ducking for multiple sounds
userStories.description: Lower other sounds when important sound plays.
acceptanceCriteria: When legendary sound plays, duck others by 50%
Ducking lasts duration of priority sound
Test legendary sounds cut through mix

userStories.title: Add sound test button in settings
userStories.description: Allow users to test each sound effect.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Test Sounds' button in audio section
Clicking plays each sound in sequence

userStories.title: Cache audio files in browser cache
userStories.description: Ensure audio files are cached for repeat plays.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Cache-Control headers to audio files
Verify browser caches audio after first load
Test subsequent loads use cached audio

userStories.title: Create rarity-specific jingles for epic+
userStories.description: Short musical jingles for high rarity cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Source or create epic jingle (2 seconds)
Source or create legendary jingle (3 seconds)
Source or create mythic jingle (5 seconds)

userStories.title: Add ambient background music option
userStories.description: Optional background music during pack opening.

userStories.title: Implement audio spatial positioning
userStories.description: Pan sounds left/right based on card position.
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate card position in results layout
Pan card flip sound to match position
Left cards pan left, right cards pan right
Test adds spatial depth to sounds

userStories.title: Add audio settings quick toggle in pack view
userStories.description: Quick mute button accessible during pack opening.
acceptanceCriteria: Add small speaker icon in corner
Test users can quickly silence sounds

userStories.title: Profile audio memory usage
userStories.description: Measure audio system memory consumption.
acceptanceCriteria: Take heap snapshot before audio preload
Take heap snapshot after audio preload
Measure memory increase from audio assets

metadata.focus: Audio and haptic feedback for pack opening
